description:
Midge and the others manage to take down the bug busters with the help of their new friend, the honeybee Ellen. Ellen apologizes for mistaking the trio for being invaders and shows them back to her home for a safe place to talk away from further robotic encounters. In the safety of Ellen`s treehouse, she tells them about her past and the tragic fate of the planet. Meanwhile, Geroppa and his henchmen find a door buried in the sand and when they go to investigate they discover something big lurking in the shadows.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Honeybee Ellen`s Secret / The True Identity of the Awakened Shadow
Mitsubachi Ellen no Himitsu / Mezameta Kyokage no Shoutai
みつばちエレンの秘密 / 目覚めた巨影の正体
